Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.Zeroable

  • Packages that use Zeroable 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.

    • Uses of Zeroable in org.strongback.components

      Subinterfaces of Zeroable in org.strongback.components 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AngleSensor
      A sensor that returns an angle.
      interface  Compass
      A sensor that determines the positional heading, or angular displacement, in degrees.
      interface  Counter
      A simple counter that is safe to be concurrently used (both Counter.get() and Counter.increment()) in one or more threads.
      interface  DistanceSensor
      A distance sensor is a sensor capable of sensing distance.
      interface  Gyroscope
      A gyroscope is a device that measures angular velocity (in degrees per second) about a single axis.
      Methods in org.strongback.components that return Zeroable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Zeroable Zeroable.zero()
      Change the output so that the current value is considered to be 0
